get.summary: Retrieves the collection of StratigraphicUnit resources.
get.description: Retrieves the collection of StratigraphicUnit resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search stratigraphic units by splitting input on non-word characters. Supports: 1 chunk (site code or number), 2 chunks (site+number or year+number), 3+ chunks (site+year+number). Invalid combinations return empty results.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem.
